titleStmt.title: My Lord Lucas his speech in the House of Peers, Feb. the 22. 1670/1 upon the reading of the subsidy bill the second time, in the presence of His Majesty.
titleStmt.author: Lucas of Shenfield, John Lucas, Baron, 1606-1671.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
